content: Give a real world example of a triangle.

A real-world example of a triangle is a road sign, specifically the "Yield" or "Give Way" sign, which is often an inverted equilateral triangle. Another common example is a slice of pizza, which often resembles a triangle shape, especially when it's cut from a round pizza. Additionally, the triangular shape of the pyramids, such as the Great Pyramid of Giza, also serves as a classic example of a triangle in architecture.
